name: Superluminal Branching System ⚪⚫ Monochrome v1
description:
Pre NFT backlog...

[03-02-19] 
Making branching systems using superluminal Stardust Plugin in after effects in order to record a full tutorial explaining the technique. 

[03-06-19]
A tutorial is published on youtube demonstrating step by step one of ways to use the particle and auxiliary nodes to create procedural branching system.
https://youtu.be/6sSzShxoK_g

[28-08-19]
The system is updated with 3D shading and multiple variations are created

[02-09-19]
4K versions with Alpha channel are made available on VJLoops.com
